last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: San-yeong's shadow returns to its original state and Hae-sang realizes that something is wrong.

name: Revenant
overview: A woman possessed by an evil spirit and a man who can see evil spirits uncover the secrets of mysterious deaths surrounding five spirits.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Gu San-yeong is possessed by an evil spirit after receiving a relic of her dead father. She meets Yeom Hae-sang, a folklorist who can see ghosts and spirits, and enters a completely different world from what she once knew.

tagline: I killed a person. It was not me.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Folklorist Hae-sang warns San-yeong that she is possessed and that people around her will die.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: San-yeong sees a ghost for the first time and eventually faces the evil spirit that possesses her.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: San-yeong and Hae-sang arrive in the new city and witness a strange shadow of a tree.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: San-yeong and Hae-sang encounter unexpected things at Baekchagol Village.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: San-yeong hears a shocking story from Gyeong-mun. Hae-sang feels that Baekchagol Village has a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Hae-sang takes the blue pottery to his grandmother, Byeong-hui, and San-yeong discovers old photos.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: San-yeong and Hae-sang are no longer able to trust each other. San-yeong looks into U-jin's identity.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: San-yeong understands and sympathizes with Kang-mo's decision, while Hae-sang falls into despair.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The evil spirit's murder makes San-yeong and Hae-sang question its true identity.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: San-yeong and Hae-sang chase after the remaining two items to identify the evil spirit's real name.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Only one item remains to get rid of the evil spirit. The spirit tries to stop them by all means.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: San-yeong's shadow returns to its original state and Hae-sang realizes that something is wrong.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Gu San-yeong is possessed by an evil spirit after receiving a relic of her dead father. She meets Yeom Hae-sang, a folklorist who can see ghosts and spirits, and enters a completely different world from what she once knew.
